ai.summary: The Marram Grass Route is a short, easy coastal hike in the United Kingdom, covering about 2.2 km along beaches and dune edges dominated by marram grass. Suitable for beginners and families, the route offers dune scenery, sea views, and a gentle, mostly flat profile with occasional soft sand sections.
ai.terrain_summary: Predominantly sandy and grassy dune paths with sections of compact dirt and boardwalks where present. Expect soft sand in the dune area and occasional uneven surfaces. Gentle elevation changes with a mostly easy walking surface.
ai.safety_notes: Check local tide times and weather before setting out. Wear sturdy footwear with good grip and bring sun protection. Stay on marked paths to protect dune ecosystems. Carry water, and be mindful of soft sand and slippery surfaces near the shoreline. Keep dogs under control where required. In coastal areas, waves and sudden squalls can occur.
recommended_gear: Sturdy walking shoes or light hiking boots
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn for milder weather and better sea views; summer offers longer daylight but can be crowded; check tide tables and wind conditions for ideal conditions.

seo.title: Marram Grass Route: Easy 2.2 km Coastal Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover the Marram Grass Route, an easy 2.2 km coastal walk in the UK. Learn about terrain, safety tips, the best season to visit, and what to bring.
